p: Metagenomic studies have also made attempts to explore the composition of feline virome ( Table 2.1). Analysis of the stools of a healthy cat from Portugal ( Ng et al., 2014) has revealed at least five different viruses of five virus families, including Picornaviridae ( Sakobuvirus), Astroviridae ( Astrovirus), Parvoviridae ( Bocaparvovirus), Reoviridae ( Rotavirus), and Picobirnaviridae ( Picobirnavirus). The presence of these viruses was confirmed by PCR screening in 10 out of 55 cats and coinfections were common. Almost all (nine out of10) cats positive for enteric viruses appeared healthy.
